modals.deleteApp.title: Confirm Deletion
modals.deleteApp.description: Are you sure you want to delete the app "{{name}}"?
modals.deleteEnv.title: Confirm Removal
modals.deleteEnv.description: Are you sure you want to remove the environment variable "{{name}}"?
modals.deleteEnv.warning: This action cannot be undone and may affect the app operation.
modals.stopApp.title: Confirm Action
modals.stopApp.description: Are you sure you want to stop the app?
modals.stopApp.warning: This will stop all processes and active connections for this app.
modals.deletePort.title: Confirm Removal
modals.deletePort.description: Are you sure you want to remove the port mapping {{mapping}}?
modals.deletePort.warning: This action cannot be undone and may affect access to the app.
modals.builderConfig.title: Configure Builder
modals.builderConfig.description: Select the builder used to build and deploy your app.
modals.zipInfo.title: Deploy via ZIP File
modals.zipInfo.description: To deploy via ZIP, the archive must contain:
modals.zipInfo.structure.title: üìÅ Required structure:
modals.zipInfo.important.title: Important:
modals.zipInfo.important.body: The .deployment_token file must contain exactly the application's token (available under the "Security" tab), with no extra spaces or line breaks.
modals.restartApp.title: Confirm Action
modals.restartApp.descriptionTop: Are you sure you want to restart the app?
modals.restartApp.descriptionBottom: This will temporarily interrupt all processes and active connections before starting the app again.
modals.rebuildApp.title: Confirm Action
modals.rebuildApp.descriptionTop: Are you sure you want to rebuild the app?
modals.rebuildApp.descriptionBottom: This will rebuild the app image from scratch and may take a few minutes.
modals.deployRepo.title: Deploy from Repository
modals.deployRepo.description: Enter the public repository URL and the branch to deploy.

security.sharing.title: Sharing
security.sharing.addCollaboratorDescript: Share the application with a user by entering their email
security.sharing.confirmDescription: Sharing this application will grant the user access to the application's information and permissions to manipulate and perform changes.
security.sharing.confirmQuestion: Do you want to share with
security.sharing.unshareConfirmDescripti: Removing sharing will revoke access to the application's information and permissions to manipulate and perform changes.
security.sharing.unshareConfirmQuestion: Do you want to remove sharing for
security.sharing.cannotShareWithYourself: You cannot share the application with yourself.

security.danger.deleteDescription: Once you delete a repository, there is no going back. Please be certain.
